headline: PPG completes on-site solar installation at Caivano, Italy facility
summary: CAIVANO, Italy, December 05, 2024--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced the completion of an on-site solar installation at its Caivano, Italy facility that will enable progress toward the company’s 2030 greenhouse gas emissions reduction targets.
